item.title: My first shiny app: calculating your hourly rate as a consultant
item.description: (One year after building it and forgetting it) Cross-posted: Medium Is it just me, or is your hard drive also full of abandoned projects, ideas et cetera? I know I’m not alone. Cleaning up my R folder the other day, I stumbled upon a file I hardly remember creating. It is was a Shiny app built to help one calculate the hourly rate of services, given a desired income and an amount of time working (billable hours in a day, days in a week, weeks in a year).
